TopicTitle: Making History DLC - Mission Builder discussion

Articles.Content:
HI all, with the recent announcement of Making History's release date. I had wondered how creative the community can get.

Aside from historical event recreation aside,  I can picture people coming up with missions beyond that. What do you guys think might be possible with the mission builder? 

Spoiler

Personally, I think a Ace Combat-styled mission (with mods) may be feasible.
